s.text: The Kings, who declared that their purpose was to win a jury's endorsement of their views, demanded only $100 in damages.
James Earl Ray could not have committed the crime : Some say Ray, who dropped out of school in 8 th grade, was not smart enough to pull it off.

He has not revealed most of their identities; one National Guard officer whom Pepper implicated in the plot sued him for libel.
He has not revealed most of their identities; one National Guard officer whom Pepper implicated in the plot sued him for libel.
He has not revealed most of their identities; one National Guard officer whom Pepper implicated in the plot sued him for libel.
Loyd Jowers confessed : In a 1993 television interview, Jowers claimed that he had hired and assisted someone else in killing King.
Ray, a racist and career criminal who had escaped from prison a year earlier, was arrested in London two months after the killing.
Police concluded that Ray killed King with a single rifle shot from the room he rented across the street.
In 1997, King's family publicly reconciled with Ray, endorsing his innocence and positing a wider conspiracy to kill King.
